title: Official presentation of Dandela Academy – IT training center
subtitle: Come and discover a new modern training center in Zango 3, dedicated to the digital skills Angolans need to work throughout the country.
trainings_body: Hands-on, job-oriented tracks: office tools, digital tools, introduction to programming and essential digital skills for the Angolan job market.
cert_body: Dandela Academy trainings are certified by INEFOP. At the end of the program, learners receive a diploma recognized at national level, allowing them to work anywhere in Angola.
contacts_hint: Calls and WhatsApp for information, registrations and bookings.
pdf_hint: To keep this flyer, use « Print » then « Save as PDF ». For more information,
